component.name: Onionetwork
component.summary: Securely and anonymously share files, host websites, and chat with friends using the Tor network

description.p: Onionetwork lets you securely and anonymously send and receive files. It works by starting a web server, making it accessible as a Tor onion service, and generating an unguessable web address so others can download files from you, or upload files to you. It does not require setting up a separate server or using a third party file-sharing service.
